messages.message:
Good morning; I'm not able to start redis when running python unit tests on my crafting sandbox. Has anyone found a fix for this? Thanks!

Looks similar to this (https://instabase.slack.com/archives/C06FA6A23/p1696553633249679), but I'm not sure how it was resolved

```./instabase_unit_tests/instabase/handler/api/v2/test_apps.py::TestStatusView::test_failure Failed with Error: command not found: redis-server
  File "/usr/local/pyenv/versions/3.9.17/lib/python3.9/unittest/case.py", line 59, in testPartExecutor
    yield
  File "/usr/local/pyenv/versions/3.9.17/lib/python3.9/unittest/case.py", line 588, in run
    self._callSetUp()
  File "/usr/local/pyenv/versions/3.9.17/lib/python3.9/unittest/case.py", line 547, in _callSetUp
    self.setUp()
  File "/home/owner/instabase/webserver/api-server/build/test/py/instabase_unit_tests/instabase/handler/api/v2/test_apps.py", line 29, in setUp
    super().setUp()
  File "/home/owner/instabase/webserver/api-server/build/test/py/instabase_test/webserver/unit/aihub_test_util.py", line 446, in setUp
    self.redis_server = RedisServer(
  File "/home/owner/.cache/pypoetry/virtualenvs/api-server-R9J_7aBi-py3.9/lib/python3.9/site-packages/testing/common/database.py", line 92, in __init__
    self.initialize()
  File "/home/owner/.cache/pypoetry/virtualenvs/api-server-R9J_7aBi-py3.9/lib/python3.9/site-packages/testing/redis.py", line 43, in initialize
    raise RuntimeError("command not found: redis-server")
RuntimeError: command not found: redis-server```
